summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2238 for the improvement of Meridian Avenue, Bagley Avenue and Corliss Avenue, each from North Forty-fifth Street to the north line of the Baltimore Addition, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, openings, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district, under Ordinance No. 23075, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
